## Problem Statement
Is your feature request related to a problem? Describe it.
E.g. "I need to optimize a portfolio with ESG constraints but..."

## Proposed Solution
A clear description of what you'd like to see implemented.

## Alternatives Considered
Other approaches you've considered and why you chose this one.

## References
Links to relevant papers, implementations, or prior art.
E.g. arXiv paper, GitHub repo demonstrating the technique.

## Additional Context
Any other context or screenshots about the feature request.
